description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 24/00127/HOU (Demolition of an existing garage and rear conservatory, erection of a x2 double storey side extensions and a part two storey/ part single storey rear extension. Fenestration alteration and new external door.) to allow alterations to the fenestration and internal changes.
decision_conditions: Condition 1 of Planning Permission ref no 24/00127/HOU is amended as follows: The following drawing numbers: RR-R00-PR-102 - Proposed Ground Floor PlanRR-R00-PR-103 - Proposed First Floor PlanRR-R00-PR-105 - Proposed Front and Rear Elevations RR-R00-PR-106 - Proposed Left and Right ElevationsRR-R00-PR-107 - Proposed Sectionsare replaced by:RR-R00-PR-102 - Proposed Ground Floor Plan received 25.04.24RR-R00-PR-103 - Proposed First Floor Plan received 25.04.24RR-R00-PR-105 - Proposed Front and Rear Elevations  received 25.04.24RR-R00-PR-106 - Proposed Left and Right Elevations received 25.04.24RR-R00-PR-107 - Proposed Sections  received 25.04.24
